titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar limitation on the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.
Child Care Flex Spending Act of 2019
Child Care Flex Spending Act of 2019
Child Care Flex Spending Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Child Care Flex Spending Act of 2019
This bill increases the amount that employees may exclude from their gross income for employer-provided dependent care assistance.
